datetime.title: Date-time
datetime.description: Event date and time in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:00 format

poster.title: Poster
poster.description: File names for the event posters. The files should be stored under /static/resources/img/events/<date>/<event.id>

small.title: Small
small.description: Small poster file name to be dispayed on the common Events page

big.title: Big
big.description: Big poster file name to be dispayed on the page of this specific event

place.title: Place
place.description: Place as city and hall IDs

city.title: City ID
city.description: City ID, should match a sub-folder from the data/places folder

hall.title: Hall ID
hall.description: Hall ID, should match a file name without extension from the data/places/<city.id> folder

timepad.title: TimePad ID
timepad.description: ID of a TimePad event to buy tickets

performers.title: Performers
performers.description: A list of IDs of the event's performers, should match file names from the data/team folder

programme.title: Programme
programme.description: The event programme, a list of composer/opus pairs

composer.title: Composer ID
composer.description: Composer ID, should match a file name without extension from the data/composers folder

work.title: Work ID
work.description: Work ID, should match a file name without extension from the data/works/<composer.id> folder
